>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: INVALID NON-UNIQUE ID

id:: td-000070

######################################################################

This test data file illustrates a non-unique ID problem.  An SML
document should not contain multiple entities with the same ID.  The
software should warn the user when it discovers a non-unique ID.

>>>problem

title:: This is problem 1

label:: problem-1

type:: technical

description:: There is no problem with problem 1.

<<<problem

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

>>>problem

title:: This is problem 2

label:: problem-1

type:: technical

description:: The problem with problem 2 is that its label says it is
problem 1.  That's a problem!  The application should warn the user it
found a non-unique ID in the document.

<<<problem

<<<DOCUMENT
